bibl.title: On the Meaning of porfÊra/porfÊrion in Greek Documentary Papyri. Avec résumés en allemand et en français. <porphura, porphurion>
bibl.note: The attestations may be split up into three categories: attestations of πορφύρα / πορφύριον = 'dye', attestations of πορφύρα / πορφύριον = 'purple-colored wool', and attestations of πορφύρα / πορφύριον allowing the meaning of both 'dye' and 'purple-colored wool'.
bibl.seg: WORP K.A., On the Meaning of πορφύρα / πορφύριον in Greek Documentary Papyri. Avec résumés en allemand et en français.

The attestations may be split up into three categories: attestations of πορφύρα / πορφύριον = 'dye', attestations of πορφύρα / πορφύριον = 'purple-colored wool', and attestations of πορφύρα / πορφύριον allowing the meaning of both 'dye' and 'purple-colored wool'.
